name: Picnic Panic (Jacob Østergaard, GingerKendall, Trever Smith, John Awesome, Malthe Jensen)
name_original: Picnic Panic (Jacob Østergaard, GingerKendall, Trever Smith, John Awesome, Malthe Jensen)
description:
You play as various food items, as you attempt to escape from the clutches of the greedy picnic goers.
But surviving wont be enough! Grab as many Kaj cakes as you can to improve your score and go down in history as the edible object that could!

Use WASD to control direction, and smash space to increase velocity
